0: My homie called me like what up man
1: Not from Florida but what up fam
2: It's been a whole lot of hatin' again
3: And if they hatin' on me damn what up then
4: I met this girl when I was 3 years old
5: And what I loved most she had so much soul
6: She said "Excuse me little homey, I know you don't know me
7: But, my name is Windy and I like to blow trees"
8: And from that point I never blow her off
9: Niggas come from out of town, I like to show her off
10: They like to act tough, she like to tow 'em off
11: And make 'em straighten up they hat cause she know they soft
12: And when I grew up she showed me how to go downtown
13: In the nighttime her face lit up, so astoundin'
14: I told her in my heart is where she'll always be
15: She never messed with entertainers cause they always leave
16: She said it felt like they walked and drove on me
17: Knew I was gang affiliated, got on TV and told on me
18: I guess that's why last winter she got so cold on me
19: She said "'Ye, keep making that platinum and gold for me!"
20: But if you really cared for her
21: Then you would have never hit the airport and followed your dreams
22: Sometimes I still talk to her
23: But when I talk to her it always seem like she talkin bout me
24: She said you left ya kids and they just like you
25: They wanna rap and make soul beats just like you
28: Talkin bout what niggas tryin to do just not new
29: Now everybody got the game figured out all wrong
30: I guess you never know what you got till is gone
31: I guess that's why I'm here and I can't come back home
32: And guess when I heard that when I was back home
33: In the interviews I'm representin you makin you proud
34: Shoot for the stars so if you fall you land on the clouds
36: Spark ya lighters and wave 'em around
37: If you don't know by now I'm talkin about Chi-town
title: Home
